Steps

Navigation

  1. The first step is to open iorad - the tutorial builder - Google Chrome
  2. Left Click on Home
  3. Left Click on Home
  4. Left Click on Insert
  5. Left Click on Design
  6. Doubleclick on Page Layout
  7. Doubleclick on References
  8. Left Click on Mailings
  9. Left Click on Review
  10. You should be all set. Click share to spread the word on how awesome this was
